name: Deadshade
description:
Deadshade is a top-down shooter game. In this game, the player has to shoot different types of enemies and pass all the waves for a final boss fight.

I hope everyone will enjoy it and thanks for playing.

Features:

1. Slow-motion effects

2. Pleasing background music

3. Different types of weapons for picking up

4. High Scores

5. Different types of juices and drinks for increasing player health

Developer:

Deadshade is made by Atlas Studio.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys = move

Left mouse button = shoot
